column1: Stuff from mac os X fuzz paper

column2:
Code from ftp://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/coreutils/
Tests in coreutils-8.9/tests/misc/
Clearly some tests for expr
Not sure how to run them yet

Code from ftp://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/groff/
No obvious tests

Code from http://web.mit.edu/freebsd/head/contrib/tzcode/zic/
(maybe not best source)
No obvious tests

Code from http://sourceforge.net/projects/zsh/files/zsh-dev/4.3.17/
Has 39 tests that we can run

Code from http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/binutils/
Some tests in binutils-2.23/binutils/testsuite
Not clear how to run any of the tests

Code from ftp://ftp.kernel.org/pub/linux/utils/util-linux/
No apparent tests for ul (there are some for other utils)
Has test cases, should be easy to set up in genprog
column4: ptyjig not working, skipping for now
